.. autoapisummary::

   core.typemedium.dp
   core.typemedium.medium_filetag


.. py:data:: dp

   

.. py:data:: medium_filetag
   :type: tuple[str, Ellipsis]
   :value: ('[params.medium_v1.0]', '[params.medium_v1.5]', '[params.medium_v2.0]', '[params.medium_v2.1]',...

   

.. py:class:: nlms(version: int = -1, material: str = '', length: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, dz: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, wavelength: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, n0: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, k: Annotated[numpy.ndarray, numpy.float64] | None = None, n2: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, beta: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, alpha: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, Tr: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, n4: Annotated[float, numpy.float64] = 0.0, plasma_params: type_plasma.plasma_coefficients | None = None)


   .. py:property:: k1
      :type: float


   .. py:property:: k2
      :type: float


   .. py:property:: k3
      :type: float


   .. py:property:: k4
      :type: float


   .. py:property:: k5
      :type: float


   .. py:attribute:: __slots__
      :value: ('version', 'material', 'length', 'dz', 'wavelength', 'n0', 'k', 'n2', 'beta', 'alpha', 'Tr',...

      

   .. py:method:: copy() -> nlms

      Shallow copy of all fields.


   .. py:method:: __repr__() -> str

      Return repr(self).


   .. py:method:: __len__() -> int

      len(medium) â†’ number of steps Nz


   .. py:method:: __eq__(other)

      Return self==value.


   .. py:method:: to_dict() -> dict


   .. py:method:: from_dict(d: dict) -> nlms
      :classmethod:


   .. py:method:: __copy__() -> nlms


   .. py:method:: __deepcopy__(memo) -> nlms



.. py:function:: readmediumparams(cmd: Union[str, pathlib.Path, TextIO], medium: nlms) -> None

   Read medium parameters from file or stream into `medium`.


.. py:function:: writemediumparams(cmd: Union[str, pathlib.Path, TextIO], medium: nlms) -> None

   Write medium parameters from `medium` to file or stream.


.. py:function:: dumpmedium(medium: nlms, level: int | None = None) -> None

   Write medium parameters to stdout if log level is sufficient.
